name: Emobi
headline: A single point integration for secure and automated EV charging.
description:
Emobi is the leading EV charging digital infrastructure that offers a single point of legal, financial, and technical integration, empowering EV automakers and fleets with secure, reliable, and seamless charging across networks, while maximizing charger utilization. The company also enables JustPlug and Plug & Charge: secure and fully-automated charging technology.

To learn more, visit www.emobi.ai.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:api; industry:energy; industry:electric-vehicles; industry:ml; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Lin Sun Fa, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Lin Sun Fa, CEO at Emobi, is an EV enthusiast with a deep knowledge in cybersecurity. Lin plays a leading role in the climate tech and energy space, garnered trust from organizations and leaders in the industry. He earned his Cybersecurity degree at Purdue University and was previously the global director of operations at Solar Chapter, a World-bank affiliated non-profit. In his free time, he is an avid traveler and a loving corgi-dad.

## Join leading
# EV Automakers
# Fleet Operators
# Charger Operators
## for a secure and automated EV charging 
Emobi delivers the critical digital infrastructure for a secure and seamless EV charging experience, connecting various EV automakers and fleets to a diverse set of charging networks.
[Book a Demo →](https://www.emobi.ai/</book-a-demo>)
Emobi works with over 100+ e-mobility companies, US government agencies, enterprises & startups
![Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d853e4807689eb0d123d42/65f1f7c70c945bc531f8bf93_Stellantis-white.png)

PRODUCT
## The Emobi Ecosystem
Our solutions unify the fragmented e-mobility market, enabling cybersecurity, automation, and interoperability for EV charging.
[Book a Demo →](https://www.emobi.ai/</book-a-demo>)
[Emobi API Hub - eRoamingA single point of legal, financial, and technical integration, maximizing charger visibility and utilization, This empowers millions of EV drivers and fleets with unparalleled convenience for their charging needs.](https://www.emobi.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Emobi Plug & Charge & JustPlugTMEmobi leverages public key infrastructure and patent-pending technologies to enable automated charging capabilities under ISO 15118-2 and ISO 15118-20 standards, allowing drivers to securely plug & charge.](https://www.emobi.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Emobi ConsultingEmpowers your e-mobility journey with deep industry insights and tailored strategies, enabling optimized operations, improved efficiency, and drive measurable success in the evolving EV landscape.](https://www.emobi.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![Emobi API Hub - eRoaming](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d853e4807689eb0d123d42/65e156c34a798055c3ef94e2_Generative%20AI%202.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d853e4807689eb0d123d42/65e156c34a798055c3ef94e2_Generative%20AI%202.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d853e4807689eb0d123d42/65e156c34a798055c3ef94e2_Generative%20AI%202.png)
TECHNOLOGY
## Behind the Ecosystem
Emobi technology ensures unparallel data quality and security
![Data Enrichment and Refinement](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d853e4807689eb0d123d42/65f12f69449f2a64b6ce40e5_Data%20refinement%20lidar%20image.png)
### Data Enrichment and Refinement
Enriching and elevating data reliability of chargers
The Emobi data enrichment and refinement engine uses fleet driving patterns and publicly available information to enrich and enhance the precision and reliability of charging data, including, location, availability, restriction, and aggregated reviews.
[See Process](https://www.emobi.ai/</book-a-demo>)
### Unification
Streamlining integration into a single access point
Emobi seamlessly adapts to diverse legal, financial, and technical standards, integrating various OCPP-compliant and legacy chargers across charging networks to deliver a unified access point compatible with all EVs and fleets.
[See Process](https://www.emobi.ai/</book-a-demo>)
![Unification](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d853e4807689eb0d123d42/65f1cd4fc7df95a26ea1ad9b_Unification%20-%20Lin%27s%20Fav.png)
![Secure Automation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d853e4807689eb0d123d42/65ef63220d283a00d17bf750_Red%20car%20on%20chip.jpg)
### Secure Automation
Enabling secure communication through digital certificates
Emobi leverages ISO 15118 standards, AI, and patent-pending technology to securely deliver Plug & Charge via the cloud and Power Line Communication (PLC). Our solution enables seamless, secure, automated charging on legacy systems, compatible with all EVs and chargers.
[See Process](https://www.emobi.ai/</book-a-demo>)
REGIONS
## Ecosystem Coverage
Emobi bridges borders to unify the fragmented e-mobility market.
NORTH AMERICA
#### United States
Over 110k+ charging ports are integrated into the Emobi hub ecosystem today.
![United States](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d853e4807689eb0d123d42/65db796a7d65c02ae74cee50_US%20Coverage%202.png)
NORTH AMERICA
#### Canada
Over 8k+ charging ports are integrated into the Emobi hub ecosystem today.
![Canada](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d853e4807689eb0d123d42/65f13269248f0423a4b09ce1_Canada-white.png)

"eMobi Labs has been a game-changer for Sheeva.AI. Over two years, they've enabled our hyper-location-based charging technology, and rapidly supporting us with patches and supports. Their consistent communication, including weekly meetings, keeps us on track."
Adam Rouls
Chief Revenue Officer, Sheeva.AI
"Vouch io has spent an enormous amount of resources to integrating the growing number of charging networks in the US. eMobi Labs and its hub ecosytem allow us to finally and fully access all chargers across network operators with the assurance of high-quality and reliable data."
Evan Pavlick
Director of Business Development, Vouch IO
"With eMobi Hub, we've launched EV Club where drivers earn points for eco-friendly driving, redeemable for rewards. Their technology and consistent communication have been indispensable and pivotal for our business. Appreciating the partnership as we drive towards a greener future!"
Rai Basharat
Chief Executive Officer, Caremiles Inc.
"We have found eMobi Labs to be an essential partner in our mission to streamline parking solutions. Their technology has allowed us to offer comprehensive charging services to our users. We highly recommend it to any company seeking reliable solutions to enable electric vehicle charging services."
Aboud Jardaneh
Cofounder, SpotAngels
"Bovlabs uses eMobi Labs technology to connect with public electric vehicle chargers and manage demand response across energy assets. Their proactive communication has exceeded our expectations. We're thrilled with the results so far and look forward to continuing the collaboration with them."
Jaikrishnan R Pillai
Chief Executive Officer, Bovlabs

## The Emobi Ecosystem

TECHNOLOGY
## Behind the Ecosystem
Emobi technology ensures unparallel data quality and security
![Data Enrichment and Refinement⟨31⟩]
### Data Enrichment and Refinement
Enriching and elevating data reliability of chargers
The Emobi data enrichment and refinement engine uses fleet driving patterns and publicly available information to enrich and enhance the precision and reliability of charging data, including, location, availability, restriction, and aggregated reviews.
See Process⟨20⟩
### Unification
Streamlining integration into a single access point
Emobi seamlessly adapts to diverse legal, financial, and technical standards, integrating various OCPP-compliant and legacy chargers across charging networks to deliver a unified access point compatible with all EVs and fleets.
See Process⟨20⟩
![Unification⟨32⟩]
![Secure Automation⟨33⟩]
### Secure Automation
Enabling secure communication through digital certificates
Emobi leverages ISO 15118 standards, AI, and patent-pending technology to securely deliver Plug & Charge via the cloud and Power Line Communication (PLC). Our solution enables seamless, secure, automated charging on legacy systems, compatible with all EVs and chargers.
See Process⟨20⟩

generated_description:
Emobi, founded in 2020 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W22, is shaping the future of electric vehicle (EV) charging in a big way. Based in San Francisco and powered by a small but capable team of nine, Emobi offers a unified platform—think of it as the digital infrastructure backbone—designed for secure and automated EV charging. 

Their mission revolves around providing a seamless, reliable, and integrated charging experience that combines legal, financial, and technical aspects into one streamlined service. This isn’t just about plugging in your car; it’s about enhancing charger utilization, especially in a fragmented charging market. They support technologies like JustPlug and Plug & Charge, which are all about making the charging process as effortless and secure as possible.

Emobi caters to a diverse customer base, including automakers, fleet operators, navigation systems, and even government entities. They boast partnerships with over 100 e-mobility companies and agencies, highlighting their integral role in the electric future.

Their offerings include:
- **Emobi Hub**: A solution for Charge Point Operators (CPOs) and Electric Mobility Service Providers (eMSPs) to enhance exposure and access to charging stations.
- **Plug & Charge**: Advanced technology enabling secure, automated charging under ISO standards.
- **Consulting Services**: Tailored strategies for navigating the evolving EV landscape.

Emobi is at the forefront of innovation with its various labs focused on interoperability and advanced charging technologies. They keep close ties with notable figures in the tech community, including Gustaf Alstromer as a Group Partner.

If you're interested in transforming how we think about EV infrastructure, Emobi is definitely worth a look. You can learn more at their website: [www.emobi.ai](https://www.emobi.ai).
